category:

description:
|  As we are currently growing our development team in Sofia, we are looking
to hire skilled FullStack .NET developers eager to work on a variety of in-
house projects and technologies according to the highest development
standards. As part of our team you will have the opportunity to use your
creativity and technical skills to develop and transform our leading platform
and brands also take part in many other projects.  
  
  
What you will be doing:  
  
• You will participate in the development of web applications using Web Forms
and MVC.  
• Collaborate with other team members to share ideas and coordinate efforts to
ensure that project deliverables are met within specific time frame.  
• Estimate, track and implement development tasks  
  
What you need for this position:  
  
• At least 5+ years of .Net / C# experience with Web applications  
  
Required experience with:  
  
o ASP.Net, Web Services, WCF, Web API  
o JavaScript, Angular, HTML 5, CSS, Ajax-  
o Minimum 2-3 years in backend software design in SQL Server , Stored
procedures, ++ASP.NET, C# , PHP  
o Languages: C#, SQL/T-SQL, JavaScript/DHTML, VBScript, HTML, XML,PHP-  
o Some experience with front end UI design preferred  
  
• Experience in Object Oriented Design and Programming, Multi-threading, web
services  
• Knowledge and experience in Design Patterns & Principles, System
Architecture and Distributed systems  
• Ability to complete all phases of software development life cycle with
minimal supervision  
• Bachelor or higher degree in Computer Science or equivalent  
• Ability to develop large scale web/database applications and to work on
multiple projects with multiple deadlines.  
• Ability to communicate clearly with business users and project manager.  
• Ability to innovate and provide functional applications with intuitive
interfaces.  
• Excellent personal and communication skills  
• English language skills on advanced level  
  
  
If you are willing to work in a fast paced, highly collaborative, dynamic work
environment, then this is the right place for you! Please send us your CV in
English. Keep in mind that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

description:
|  This is a fantastic opportunity to join our Quality Assurance Team based in
our Office in Sofia.  
The ideal candidate will have a can-do attitude, passion for quality,
attention in detail and extensive experience in testing web & mobile
applications.  
We are looking for an exceptional individual whose key responsibilities will
be:  
• Testing of web portals, mobile applications & business processes  
• Working closely with Development Team to ensure timely and quality product
releases  
• Contribute to the Creation and Execution of Quality process standards  
• Execute test plans and provide adequate documentation  
• Continually improving testing methodology, testing procedures, and test
environments  
Required Experience & Qualifications:  
• 2+ years of experience in Testing Web & Mobile Applications  
• BS / MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience  
• Proven track record and competency in Quality Assurance concepts  
• Test planning  
• Test case design  
• Test case prioritization  
• Test case execution  
• Bug reporting & tracking  
• Attention to Detail. Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving
abilities.  
• Knowledge of web services testing & SOA testing will be considered as a
plus  
• Knowledge of DB Scripting will be considered as a plus  
• Knowledge of client side debugging and analyzing web rendering and
performance  
• Experience of testing both back-end systems and front-end GUIs  
• Experience in testing mobile applications & m-Sites  
• Designing and implementing new automation test cases with tools and scripts.
Automation using Selenium will be considered as a plus.  
• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet set deadlines  
• Good communication and collaboration skills  
  
If you want to make a difference and work with a top-rated team of talented
individuals, come and join us. We offer a friendly, diverse work environment
and very competitive benefits package. If this position is of interest to you
and matches your background and career needs, we can’t wait to hear from you!

title: Workplace Services Architect
category:
|

  * ИТ - Административни дейности и продажби,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на хардуер
description:
|  Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an
organization within Hewlett Packard Enterprise which delivers pre-sales,
consulting and engineering services for the Enterprise Services customers in
HPE. GE&TC takes accountability for infrastructure design and build,
develops architecture, strategy and roadmaps, performs IT workload migration
and leads infrastructure deployments.  
  
Job scope/summary:  
The workplace services Architect intervenes most of the time in Transformation
projects, and sometimes in the pre-sales and service delivery phases. In a
Transformation project, he/she is typically the main technical resource,
working closely with the Program/Project Manager. This is a customer-facing
position, involving some travel. It will require a high level of involvement
in the project, and availability. The functional scope covered includes, but
is not limited to the workplace domain. The architect will address technical
considerations and issues in technical areas within workplace, or for which
there is a dependency with the WPS domain, such as Wintel server management.  
This role requires solid knowledge about desktop management services, such as
software management, virtualization and deployment, and also basic knowledge
in the areas surrounding desktop management such as desktop security, asset
management, onsite and remote support. Since the role is rather “horizontal”,
it does not require being a specialist in one of these areas.  
The integration architect will join a team of architects located all over
Europe.  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
As part of transformation:  
• Own end to end solutions and High Level Design for Workplace Services  
• Contribute and review Low Level Design from project streams  
• Analyze the contract and ensure the defined solution is aligned with HPE’s
contractual obligations  
• Support the Project Manager to create the project plan and to identify risks
and timing  
• Lead the Hand-over to production  
• Participate in the Design Authority during transformation  
• Lead the Execution of test and pilots  
• Promote standardization and automation during transformation in T&T
engagements  
• Architect non-standard solutions  
  
  
Qualifications  
• Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
8 + years of professional experience and a Bachelor of Arts/Science or
equivalent degree in computer science or related area of study; without a
degree, 3 additional years of relevant professional experience  
• Fluent in English language , spoken and written  
• Additional languages is a plus  
  
Technical skills (procedures and documents the employee has to be acquainted
with):  
Has mastered at least one technical discipline with strong knowledge in at
least three major technology areas.  
• Software distribution  
• Image management  
• Software lifecycle services  
• Technical desktop integration  
• Virtualization, thin clients  
• Messaging, Office365, Lync knowledge is a plus  
  
Business skills and qualities:  
• Ability to meet strict deadlines.  
• Experience with large companies and mass rollout is a plus  
• Self-learner  
• Able to lead and motivate a technical team  
• Natural leader  
• Experience in a customer facing role  
• Consulting skills  
• Confident Communication and presentation skills  
• Good understanding of Program and Project Management.  
• Understanding of Change Management  
• Ability to translate technical details into concise and easy to understand
written form. Ability to write relevant components of a proposal document.  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Medical insurance  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days)  
• Food vouchers  
• Opportunity to use free bus / parking  
• Life insurance  
• Wellness program  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations

registered as an administrator of personal data to the Commission for Data
Protection. Some of the information that you provide voluntarily is personal

title: Windows Server Migration Engineer
category:
|

  * ИТ - Административни дейности и продажби,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на хардуер
description:
|  Description  
  
Global Engineering and Technical Consulting team is responsible for
architecture and engineering and integration of DCS & Cloud solutions
based on the standards or nonstandard portfolio offerings. Often our services
are utilized during the transformation phase to help a client move from
“current state” to “future state”. We enable accounts and delivery teams to
provide DCS and Cloud Services that were contracted with the client.  
  
  
Job scope / Summary  
  
Applies Windows Operating System technical knowledge to solve complex business
requirements and is regarded as a subject matter expert. Uses consulting
skills including, but not limited to: interviewing clients to understand
business needs, developing technical solutions, migration plans and working
with multiple teams to accomplish project deliverables. Capable of consulting,
designing, testing, implementing, managing capability requirements into a new
or existing infrastructure using HP methodology. Able to integrate custom
software components into the environment and provide third level production
infrastructure support.  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
•Responsible for preparing and planning of server migrations  
•Responsible for client/account interactions as required  
•Responsible for communication and close collaboration with the Migration
Technical Lead  
•Responsible for defining the methodologies that will be used by System
Administrators for migrating from the CMO to the FMO  
•Responsible for providing third level production support during a migration
phase for other involved teams  
•Responsible for producing part or all of the technical solution for the
account/client, in accordance with an agreed technical design  
•Responsible to make sure that the project deliverable is completed accurately
and on time  
•Responsible for escalating issues, problems, risks, and constraints to the
appropriate parties for clarification and resolution  
•Responsible for keeping abreast of new/emerging technology  
•Responsible for design, development, implementation using the Global
Engineering specifications, methodology and practical application of ITIL
practices and processes  
•Responsible for documenting project requirements, risks, design, test plans,
deployment procedures and operation/support procedures following the Global
Engineering Quality Management Process (GE QMS) standards  
  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
  
•Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical
Engineering, Management Information Systems, MBA or equivalent  
•Minimum 5 years of experience in the IT Services industry  
  
Other requirements:  
  
•English fluent mandatory  
  
Technical skills:  
  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding of both server hardware & server
operating system deployment, configuration, testing & administration.  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding in at least one of the following
migration tools: DoubleTake, Platespin, VMWare vCenter Converter, Robocopy,
AppZero  
•Demonstrates specialist understanding of script debugging & automation
principles with prior experience of working in PowerShell, VBScript and
associated scripting/mark-up languages (e.g. Batch files, HTML, and XML).  
•Experienced troubleshooting to a specialist level within Microsoft Windows
Server Network Infrastructures.  
•Knowledge and understanding of:  
  
◦Microsoft Active Directory  
◦Core Windows Network Services  
◦Advanced Windows Network Services  
◦Network technologies  
  
Technical background in one or more of the following is considered as
advantage:  
  
•Private Cloud and Virtual Private Cloud technologies  
•Hypervisor technologies (Hyper-V, VMWare,…)  
•Ability to Design, install, configure, optimize and document Windows Server
2003 to Windows Server 2012 environments:  
  
◦File and Print Server Migrations  
◦Microsoft Cluster Service (Windows 2003) and Failover Clustering (Windows
2008 and 2012)  
◦Active Directory and DNS  
  
•Experience with Backup solutions  
•Experience with Storage Solutions  
  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Medical insurance  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days)  
• Food vouchers  
• Opportunity to use free HP bus / parking  
• Life insurance  
• Wellness program  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations

description:
|  Description  
  
  
Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an organization
within Hewlett Packard Enterprise which delivers pre-sales, consulting and
engineering services for the Enterprise Services customers in HPE. GE&TC
takes accountability for infrastructure design and build, develops
architecture, strategy and roadmaps, performs IT workload migration and leads
infrastructure deployments  
  
  
  
The role of the Consulting Enterprise Architect is to provide clients and HP
accounts team with strategic thought leadership and innovation to enable
competitive opportunities and address business unit challenges that require IT
solutions and/or services.  
  
  
  
The Consulting Enterprise Architect should:  
  
\- Be the single point of contact for HP client technology strategies,
roadmaps, and transformation plans.  
\- Be responsible for understanding and quantifying the client's baseline
technology portfolio.  
\- Influence the client's technology portfolio planning activities.  
\- Be the client advocate into HP portfolio planning.  
\- Strategize with pan-HP portfolio organizations to address the client’s
challenges.  
\- Develop long lasting relationships with CxO level clients as a trusted
technical advisor.  
\- Take the lead to shape the innovation agenda.  
\- Work closely with AGM/AE to optimize account planning to address innovation
as well as delivery optimization.  
\- Maintain strong operational ties to the Business Unit’s Chief Technology
Office.  
  
  
  
Role Overview:  
  
  
\- Develop and deliver sales presentations at CEO levels for Opportunities  
\- Represent the account in all technical aspects of Solution Design and
infrastructure architecture (architecture-production)  
\- Develop for client technically or operationally feasible long-term IT
strategies and plans  
\- Support both Standard & Non-Standard Service Requests  
\- Assist Account team with analyzing and implementing Portfolio Standards for
both Software and Hardware implementations  
\- Assist Account Project managers on the following:  
organize and ensure solution design documents are completed  
\- Identify and ensure all infrastructure and architectural deliverables are
noted in project schedules  
\- Validate the dates for infrastructure deliverables in the project schedule
are realistic and achievable  
\- Validate the scope of the solution meets contractual and SLA requirements
(availability, performance, capacity)  
\- Validate T&T Plans, resource schedules and costs  
\- Provide IE leadership between technical towers for integration issues
/concerns  
\- Leverage portfolio capabilities, where appropriate  
\- Incorporate ESSM (i.e., SRA), when appropriate  
\- Leverage Platform / Network / SAN Templates  
\- Understand and maintain, as appropriate, roadmaps for the technologies in
use at the account  
\- Review/create/maintain Enterprise Architecture Documents  
\- Ensure all design summary proposals adhere to capability quality standards,
GE-QMS process and artifact requirements.  
\- Review solution during the construction phase and validate the “as built”
environment matches the detailed design  
  
  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
  
Technical Skills and Experiences:  
  
At least eight years of hands on experience with the following platforms:  
\- Linux, Solaris, UNIX, AIX, VMware, Windows 2008  
  
  
Meets web infrastructure-engineering skills in the following areas:  
\- Web Server (Sun One, iPlanet, etc) (3 years of experience)  
-Knowledge Knowledge in Oracle Database  
-Knowledge in Backup/Restore (TSM, Networker, Avamar, etc)   
-Knowledge in Sun Java Enterprise Server   
\- Knowledge in BEA WebLogic  
\- Knowledge in Red Hat  
\- Solid understanding in Networks, Firewalls, Routers, IP Filters  
\- Knowledge in Load Balancers (BigIP/F5, Cisco) is a plus  
\- Knowledge in J2EE  
  
  
Non-technical Skills and Experiences:  
  
\- Demonstrates strong English communication skills (written and oral)  
\- Has strong technical project leadership capabilities and be able to deal
with complex issues with customers and vendors.  
\- Prior experience with application or infrastructure development projects  
\- Ability to manage projects within scope of responsibility.  
\- Ability to work flexible (8) hour shift – NA hours for all project
assignments  
\- Capable of implement projects using ISO, SLC, and PM2.  
\- Ability to interact with customers regarding business and technical
information  
\- Demonstrates strong team building skills - ability to work as a team (PM,
Delivery, Client & Engineering)  
\- Strong estimating skills  
\- Demonstrate strong initiative to learn with minimal direction  
\- Self-starter  
\- Keeps people informed through the use of appropriate methods and media  
\- Shares relevant or useful information in a timely manner  
  
  
We offer a challenging role including:  
• Continuous learning and technical training opportunities  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA

This position is within the ITO Global Engineering & Technical Consulting
organization, as part of ESM (Enterprise Service Management) and Tools
competency center. We define and implement service management processes and
tooling solutions for ITO outsourcing customers: ITIL processes, workflow,
monitoring, service level reporting, configuration database, etc. Either in
presales support or in post-sales implementation, you will need to ensure that
a solution for a particular client is fit for purpose, in line with HPE’s
contractual obligations and with your organization strategy.  
  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
  
· EMEA ITSM Process Implementation Manager is a leveraged resource for
Transition and Transformation projects, implementing ITSM processes and
workflow tool within HPE delivery and on some occasions in Customer
environments. It is in a high profile team that successfully delivers ITSM

Implementation;

of tools; be driver of the process and the tool implementation during T&T
project;

\- 5+ years of professional experience and a Bachelor of Arts/Science or

in total).

· University degree in IT, Computer Science, or equivalent academic, or on-
the-job experience

|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential.  
  
To ensure the expansion of our Operations Center in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit Spanish speaking CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVES.  
  
The CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE is a direct link between the company and
the customers located around the globe, looking for service. The function of
the position is to help customers by providing information and guidance over
the phone and via email.  
  
Main responsibilities:  
• Provide comprehensive support to pharmaceutical companies and life-science
organizations personnel (doctors, nurses, patients, sales force, etc.) in
Spanish and English.  
• Adhere to high company standards for quality, accuracy, thoroughness,
timeliness and consistency in customer care.  
  
Job requirements:  
• Fluency in both Spanish and English  
• Excellent interpersonal and communications skills  
• Willingness to learn and obtain new skills and competencies  
• Availability to work on shifts  
• Ethics, Team work and Positive attitude  
• High school diploma  
• Knowledge of MS Office, Windows and Internet applications  
  
What we offer:  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Real opportunities for career progression with leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Possibility to combine work and study  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
*Your personal data is secure with us.  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

description:
|  At HP, we believe in the power of ideas. We use ideas to put technology to
work for everyone. And we believe that ideas thrive best in a culture of
teamwork. That is why everyone - at every level in every function, is
encouraged to have original ideas, to express them and to share them. We trust
anything can be achieved if you really believe in it, and we will invest in
your ideas to change lives and the way people work. This vision is what sets
us apart as a company. At HP we work across borders, and without limits.
Global virtual teams share resources and pool their big ideas to solve
business issues and meet personal goals. Everyone is valued for the unique
skills, experiences and perspective they bring. That’s how we work at HP. And
this is how ideas and people grow.  
  
HP is a proven leader in personal systems and printing, delivering innovations
that empower people to create, interact, and inspire like never before. We
leverage our strong financial position to extend our leadership in traditional
markets and invest in exciting new technologies.  
  
HP has an impressive portfolio and strong innovation pipeline across areas
such as:  
• blended reality technology - our unique Sprout by HP will change the way
people do things  
• 3D printing  
• multi-function printing  
• Ink in the office  
• tablets, phablets, notebooks  
• mobile workstations  
  
We’re looking for visionaries who are ready to make an impact on the way the
world works. At HP, the future’s yours to create!  
  
The Printing and Personal Systems (PPS) EMEA Managed Services Organization
offers Managed Services & Solutions to Enterprise and Corporate customers
combining Hardware, Supplies, Financing and Services in a Managed Print
Services (MPS) offering. The Managed Services Business is expanding and is a
strategic growth area to HP.  
HP is opening its doors for a highly motivated student with interest to
develop in an international and demanding environment. During the 6 months
internship program in HP Inc. MS organization, together with and under the
supervision of her/his assigned mentor, the candidate will provide support to
ADMs (Account Delivery Managers) and customers in various EMEA countries, thus
gaining practical skills and knowledge in the MPS business environment.  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
• Support ADMs in managing customer change requests and customer queries  
• Manage day-to-day operational tasks and follow-up the successful completion  
• Coordinate all relevant resources (internal/external partners)  
• Meet the required quality of work in accordance to the team targets  
• Meet the deadlines and keep the service level agreements  
• Manages multiple tasks simultaneously with minimal supervision  
• Participate in projects working on process reviews and process documentation
under the supervision of the assigned mentor  
  
Qualifications  
Education (degree) and professional experience required:  
• Current university students  
  
Personal skills and qualities:  
• Customer oriented with strong English and German language skills (spoken and
written)  
• Excellent team player  
• Strong communication and leadership skills  
• Time management skills and working with tough deadlines  
• Flexible and eager to share and acquire knowledge  
• Confident telephone manner  
• Reliable, fast learner and well organized person with a flexible and
responsive attitude  
• Comfortable to work in a remote, virtual environment  
• Ability to easily adapt to organizational and structural changes  
• Process and Methodology focused  
  
Technical skills (procedures and documents the employee has to be acquainted
with):  
• Good computer literacy – (MS Office)

description:
|  Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) creates new possibilities for technology
to have a meaningful impact on people, businesses, governments and society.
HPE invents, engineers, and delivers technology solutions that drive business
value, create social value, and improve the lives of our clients. The largest
line of business - Enterprise Services produces better business outcomes for
our clients through our comprehensive Infrastructure Technology Outsourcing
Services. Our service excellence, with consistent globally delivered
standardized services guarantees clients peace of mind, while our ability to
drive innovation ensures clients a compelling strategy for the future.  
  
HPE Enterprise Services is currently seeking to identify highly motivated and
qualified candidates for the role of Messaging and Collaborations Specialist.  
  
The M&C Specialist is responsible for delivering services to outsourcing
accounts on time, on target with quality. The main goal is to deliver project
work on time, in budget and to achieve a high level of customer/account
satisfaction. He/She works in close relationship with other teams and is under
direct supervision by the team Management.  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
\- Design Messaging and Collaboration service solutions  
\- Optimize the various aspects of the Messaging and Collaboration designing
and implementation processes  
\- Increase the overall efficiency and utilization levels  
\- Standardize and streamline processes  
\- Provide value for the customer through quality service  
\- Excellent awareness of the customer’s business and in-depth knowledge of
the customer’s environment and support processes  
  
Qualifications  
  
Education:  
  
\- University degree in Computer Science or other IT related discipline  
\- Appropriate Certifications  
  
Experience:  
  
\- At least 5 years in the field of the technologies stated in Technical
knowledge requirements  
  
General requirements:  
\- Strong analytical skills.  
\- Team player.  
\- Good communication skills.  
\- Fluent English.  
\- Well organized and self-managed person.  
\- Ability to work independently  
  
Technical knowledge:  
  
  
Deep technical knowledge on:  
  
\- Windows Server 2008/2012,  
\- Active Directory  
\- Networks  
\- IT Infrastructure.  
  
  
Experience:  
  
\- Implementing and supporting the Microsoft Unified Communication
Applications (Live Communication Server, Office Communication Server, and
Lync).  
\- Developing hardware specifications for Microsoft Unified Communications
implementation.  
\- Interfacing Microsoft Unified Communications applications with Exchange and
traditional telephony systems.  
\- Voice/UC infrastructure design, implementation and troubleshooting  
\- Hands on Knowledge / Experience of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) and
IP trunking concepts, topology design – VoIP media RTP/RTCP  
\- Experience working with telecom carriers and different trunk protocols and
signaling Protocols – ISDN, CAS, Analogue, T1/E1 PRI, E&M  
  
  
What we offer:  
  
  
On this position you will work in an environment where fast educated decisions
may save the day, however quality and perfection are our major objective.  
Working remotely from Bulgaria you will be reaching customers from pole to
pole.  
  
In addition, we offer:  
  
  
\- Competitive remuneration package  
\- Exposure to the newest technologies  
\- Lead challenging projects, working closely with various IT functions and
vendors  
\- Company funded trainings and certifications  
\- Medical insurance  
\- 24 days paid leave  
\- Food vouchers  
\- Flexible working time and work from home policy  
\- Wellness program  
\- HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services  
\- Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations

them.

only. They are not a complete list of all required responsibilities, duties

description:
|  Visteon is a global technology company that designs, engineers and
manufactures innovative cockpit electronics products and connected car
solutions for most of the world’s major vehicle manufacturers. Visteon is a
leading provider of driver information and controls, audio and infotainment,
and domain controllers; its brands include LightScape®, OpenAir® and
SmartCore™. With Visteon has more than 12,000 employees at 50 facilities in 21
countries.  
For our Design Center in Sofia we are now looking for a communicative and
organized person to join our team at the position of:  
  
Senior automation SW Engineers  
  
Your responsibilities:  
• Take part of design, development and enhancements of advanced continues
integration systems  
• Design and develop SW for fully automated product verification, testing and
system measurements  
• Build process optimizations  
• Design and develop tools to improve SW development processes and workflow  
• Analyse and find solutions for complex cross domain SW issues  
• Take part in analysis and optimizing system overall performance  
• Coach team members to increase efficiency and knowledge  
• Estimate and plan software tasks  
• Integrate SW for complex products running on multi Core/OS platforms  
  
Your qualifications:  
• University degree in the area of Informatics, Computer Science or
Information Technologies  
• At least 3 year of professional experience in one of the following
programming languages: Python, Perl, Java or C/C++  
• Professional experience in design and development for complex software
systems  
• Experience in system development and Integration of Unix based systems  
  
Experience in one or more of the following areas will be considered as an
advantage:  
O Bash, Linux OS  
O Continues integration tools – e.g. Jenkins  
O System profiling tools  
O Static and dynamic code analysis tools  
O OS Virtualization  
O Very good English. It is an advantage for you to have knowledge in French or
German languages.  
  
Your benefits:  
• Possibilities for career development in international company  
• Professional development based on up-to-date training opportunities and
expertise  
• Competitive remuneration package with pool of benefits and incentives
schemes at place  
• Open and friendly working atmosphere  
• Social activities.  
  
Only short-listed applicants will be contacted.

title: Technical Support Lead with Spanish or German
category:
|

  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на хардуер,
  * Контакт центрове (Call Centers)
description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of support services for life sciences companies worldwide. We
operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) servicing 18 out of the
top 20 Pharma companies and clinical research organizations in the world.
Since we had opened an office in Sofia in 2005, we are constantly attracting
talented people and help them develop their potential.  
  
If you are a tech-savvy person who has the skills and experience to handle
high complexity cases in a Service desk environment this is the right
challenge for you!  
  
We now offer the opportunity to become part of an exciting business field and
grow professionally by joining us at the position of Technical Support Lead.  
  
Job Summary  
  
• Provide an advanced level of technical, investigational and customer support
in English and other foreign languages for applications/hardware defined in
the scope of the service delivery structure for various pharmaceutical
clients.  
• Identify, troubleshoot and resolve customer problems by utilizing all
technical resources available, while adhering to strict quality standards.  
• Maintain deep expert knowledge on applications in scope, constantly strive
to expand it and apply it in practice  
• Act as mentor and reference point for Tier I Service desk agents  
• Participate in onsite visits to client locations and act as front line IT
expert for the client.  
  
Principal responsibilities  
  
Technical troubleshooting  
  
• Provide assistance to Tier I Service desk agents in daily production work  
• Perform production work as required by Operations Manager  
• Provide professional and timely expert support for all applications/hardware
in scope  
• Liaise closely with Service desk and Client teams during the case
investigation, to collect further information and provide a suitable
resolution to the user.  
• Perform multiple remote sessions support simultaneously using the relevant
client tools  
• Act as an internal escalation point for Tier I Service desk agents and
assist with resolution of problems, issues, errors or other process related
cases.  
• Anticipate customer needs and proactively identifies solutions  
• Plan, prioritize, organize and complete work to meet established objectives  
  
Escalations management  
  
• Promptly investigate calls escalated from the Tier I Service desk agents
using the utilities and tools available.  
• Escalate advanced customer issues to the respective Third party escalation
teams as outlined in the respective process documentation.  
• Regularly monitor and coordinate escalations to Third party teams. Triage
incidents that require further investigation by working in collaboration with
all Service desk teams, as well as with Management and Client teams.  
• Handle potential outage situations, perform necessary steps to ensure the
reported problem falls into the outage definitions, take respective actions in
regards to the outage, and escalate accordingly as per the established
procedures.  
• Provide regular updates to all involved parties and act as a primary contact
for requested outage information.  
  
  
Testing, validation and continuous service improvement responsibilities  
  
• Contribute to service delivery working practice and knowledge base
documentation. When necessary, assist in creating new documentation to
describe activities / processes.  
• Participate in testing and validation activities as outlined by Management
and Client.  
• Monitor, identify and analyze patterns and trends of incidents handled in
order to identify potential opportunities for improvement and enhancement of
processes and customer satisfaction.  
• Identify best practices for handling certain incidents and work closely with
the Service desk management to potentially implement those best practices.  
• Participate in special projects, client events and visits, as outlined by
management.  
• Prepare ad-hoc and regular reporting upon Client request or upon Service
desk Management request.  
  
Training  
  
• Provide desk-side assistance and mentoring to new team members  
• Deliver account-specific training for new team members and ad-hoc trainings  
  
Job requirements  
  
Education:  
  
• High school degree  
• Bachelor’s degree in IT/Engineering/Information systems is a plus  
• Any Microsoft/Cisco/Technical Certifications is a plus  
  
Experience:  
  
• 2+ years of experience in user support, application support, application
development, or related areas in IT  
• Experience in assisting customers through alternate intake channels (phone
and nonverbal channels like: live chat, email, social media and web form
submissions)  
• Experience in troubleshooting remote access tools (VPN) and general
connectivity (LAN/WAN) issues by phone  
  
Skills and competencies:  
  
• Windows XP/7/8/10 deep knowledge and understanding  
• MS Office 2003/7/10/13 advanced skills  
• Microsoft Exchange Online in co-existence with Exchange (2003 / 2007 / 2010)
Mailbox and Public Folder Databases.  
• Troubleshooting Mail Routing and messaging protocols  
• Active Directory and TCP/IP Networking; domains and DNS records management  
• Manage Exchange Anti-Spam, Anti-Virus, Backup solutions  
• Knowledge of Networking and IP Telephony  
• iOS/Windows phone expertise and understanding  
• Knowledge of CRM systems is a plus  
• Very good written and spoken command of English – C1 level as per the Common
European Framework of Reference for Languages  
• Very good written and spoken command of Spanish or German – C1 level as per
the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages  
• Excellent communication skills  
• Strong Customer service approach  
• Problem solving skills  
• Strong detail orientation  
• Strong decision making skills  
• Strong analytical skills  
• Ability to work independently with limited supervision  
• Business travel up to 30% of the time  
  
What we offer:  
  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills and develop your
technical expertise  
• Opportunity for career progression with leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
*Your personal data is secure with us.  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

description:
|  For our office in Sofia we are looking for a tester. You will work for our
company DEGIRO, DEGIRO is part of HIQ Invest and Fundshare.  
You will be part of the IT department which consists of around 25 people; java
developers, front end developers, system administrators and C++ developers. We
have three offices, our headquarter is in Amsterdam, for this position you
will first receive on the job training at our office in Amsterdam and after a
couple of months we will ask you to relocate to our office in Sofia.  
What we are looking for in a candidate  
\- Master/Bachelor degree in Computer Science or related field preferred  
\- Experience as a QA tester, manual and/or automatic  
\- Willingness to learn how to monitor applications using multiple methods
(application server logs, browser inspection tools, etc.)  
\- Experience with querying databases to create/validate test data using SQL
tools  
\- Affinity with financial markets  
\- Good spoken and written English  
\- Willing to relocate to Sofia  
  
What the job entails  
\- Prepare comprehensive test scenarios to cover all requirements through all
testing phases, including creating and executing test cases, functional
testing, integration testing, regression testing and mobile/device testing .  
\- Collect and aggregate information from the trading desks, clearly
articulate the steps required to reproduce a bug with accompanying details
(screenshots, test data, etc.) .  
\- Manage testing feedback, prioritizes defects and communicate with
developers to ensure proper resolution. Create automatic tests with
appropriate tools/programs .  
\- Maintain consistent dialogue with product developers and software
developers throughout development and test cycles  
\- Besides the tasks mentioned above we expect you to take active part in
improvement of QA processes and practices and be in trend regarding QA tools
and technologies  
  
We offer  
  
A fulltime job in a fast growing and international company where you have the
chance to first receive training in Amsterdam and later you will work at our
office, the Vertigo Tower, in Sofia. You will earn a competitive salary and
you have the chance to deserve a bonus. We sponsor relevant training and
education.  
  
Who we are  
DEGIRO was established in 2008 to service the professional market. DEGIRO
offers fast trading infrastructure at professional prices. In 2013 DEGIRO
started offering this service to retail investors giving them online access to
100 security exchanges worldwide at wholesale prices. Currently DEGIRO is
expanding the online brokerage within the European Union. DEGIRO is a
subsidiary of LPE Capital and a sister company of HiQ Invest and Fundshare.
HiQ Invest offers Fund Management and Fundshare offers fund administration
services. LPE Capital is active in Amsterdam, Hong Kong and Sofia.

title: Data scientist C++
category:
|

  * Дизайн, Криейтив, Видео и Анимация,
  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер
description:
|  Statistician, Data scientist, Real Time Marketplace Forecasting of Time
Series, C++  
Radioactive operates in Software development, Project management, Digital
marketing, Sales and call center services.  
We have a team of statisticians, economists, machine learning scientists, and
operations researchers who develop and own the mathematical and computational
technology which is used for price forecast and augmenting trader’s decision
in real-time on the currency and commodities marketplace. The team aligns with
Radioactive’s marketplace related product and engineering initiatives to
enable the highest precision price projection of instrument and optimal assets
management in cooperation with professional market traders. These fascinating
and challenging problems include: building and optimizing the our prediction
engine; identifying and predicting price correlation and movement patterns
from various indices provided from several platforms and APIs including
trading volume, commitment of traders, historical index data; building
libraries or embedding and optimizing existing implementation of latest
methodologies in applied statistics for time series in cooperation with highly
qualified team of scientist and engineers; and many more.  
As a statistician focusing on Real-Time Marketplace Forecasting, you will be
developing a variety of forecasting models together with engineered
implementations for use in Radioactive’s marketplace decision systems. Not
only will you be modeling localized index price patterns, and trading
behaviors, but also the effects of other external factors such as commitment
of traders, price of commodities and other indexes, and trading volume.
Additionally, this role involves structuring and using time series databases
for a variety of uses within these forecasting systems. Therefore, in this
position you will play a central role in a majority of Radioactive’s
marketplace optimization decisions and have the opportunity to tackle some of
commodities and currency market's most innovative and impactful problems
related to the operational execution and economic decisions of the business.  
For the real-time forecasting statistician role, particular preference is
given to candidates with empirical backgrounds in Statistics, Econometrics,
Biostatistics, or similar. Forecasting areas of special interest include:  
 Time Series data  
 Non linear regression models such are Support Vector Regression and its
cutting edge advancements  
 Data preparation including detrending, SSA, Wavelets, Fourier transform  
 Smart hyper-parameter selection methods based on PSO, GA, Simplex and linear
methods as well as solving dual and quadratic problems  
Here are the kinds of skills we are looking for:  
 Minimum 2 years of prior data science or engineering experience in
forecasting, time series analysis, and econometrics. Spatial statistics
knowledge a plus. Multiple role levels available conditional on experience.  
 Strong quantitative background: Masters or PhD strongly preferred  
 Excellent software development skills in one or more of C, C++, or similar.
Experience as a software engineer is a strong plus.  
 Familiarity with analytical tools such as R, Python or Matlab  
 Familiarity with relational database implementations and SQL - Experience
with column oriented storage and Postgres is a plus  
 Experience with time series databases such are InfluxDB, OpenTSDB, KairosDB,
Druid, KDB+ or similar is a plus  
 Experience in OpenCL, CUDA or OpenMP is a strong plus.  
PERKS:  
 Multinational and multicultural office atmosphere  
 Ground floor opportunity with the team; you design and shape the strategic
direction of the company.  
 Work at any of the offices of the company in Belarus, Bulgaria.  
 The rare opportunity to work on the latest in applied statistics and machine
learning using technologies way ahead of anything available in the public
domain.  
 Sharp, motivated co-workers in a positive and fun office environment.  
 Ability to learn and advance working next highly educated and experience
colleagues on patented and proprietary technologies and see their
implementations work in real life high performance scenario.  
 Any specific personal needs are negotiable and conditions are flexible.  
 Competitive remuneration and Social benefits package

description:
|

**As a Business Analyst,** located in Sofia, you will be responsible for providing support for BISAM’s B-One product - a market-leading performance and attribution software solution.

B-One is trusted by 10 of the top 50 global asset managers whose combined
Assets under Management exceed 10 trillion USD with global operations across
North America, EMEA and APAC.

  
These global asset managers rely on B-One on a daily basis for:

  * the official results that are provided to their clients/funds
  * the performance analytics explaining their investment processes that are used by portfolio managers, relationship managers, sales & marketing and client reporting teams.

You will work as the first point of contact for all customer queries regarding
the product functionality as well as any issues raised by Professional
Services team during B-One implementations and other customer projects. This
role is integral to building strong customer relations and the individual
needs to be a strong communicator and customer focused to succeed in the role.

The customer experience team works closely with a number of internal teams to
resolve customer queries. The individual will need to manage and maintain
communications across all of these teams including Product Support, Architects
and Research & Development in tracking bugs, to ensure timely responses
and resolutions as well as the Account Management team in case a customer
raises an Enhancement request or requires Professional Services’ assistance.

** **

**Responsibilities:**

Reporting to the Head of Customer Support, you will assist the support team on
the following tasks:

  * Contribute to the on-going support of clients by analyzing and solving complex business issues, using financial formulas and calculations
  * Responsible for the management of support tickets ensuring timely responses are sent in accordance to the Service Level Agreements
  * Investigate and troubleshoot tickets raised by customers qualifying any potential software defects
  * Support the defect resolution process by providing clear descriptions of defects and validating the resulting fixes
  * Identify errors and mistakes in BISAM’s software and documentation and suggest corrections and improvements
  * Logging and assisting in debugging identified defects, working with other teams within BISAM, ensuring all information required is captured and transferred
  * Active participation in enriching the Knowledge Base
  * Engage proactively with customers regarding their tickets, providing regular and clear updates
  * Maintain a professional and courteous manner with customers and colleagues alike
  * Build strong relationships with all areas of the BISAM business so as to ensure delivery of a world class service to the customers
  * Managing customer expectations and relationships to the highest level
  * Support your colleagues as required in the resolution of customer enquiries
  * Continually seek to develop your knowledge of the B-One solution, both technical and functional

** **

**Desired Qualifications, Skills & Experience:**

  * Strong Bachelor or Master Degree in Finance or Mathematics
  * Highly proficient in spoken and written English
  * Academic or professional background in finance
  * Strong knowledge of Excel and financial formulas
  * Knowledge of financial products and instruments
  * Strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills
  * Strong math skills
  * Highly pro-active approach
  * Analytical thinker
  * Strong team player
  * Service minded attitude
  * Very enthusiastic and motivated

  

  * Speaking French is a big plus as some of our clients are French
  * Knowledge of the asset management industry is a plus
  * Experience with performance measurement or attribution is a plus
  * Knowledge of SQL and databases in general is a plus
  * Technical skills with regard to software applications is a plus

**Location:**

  * Sofia (training is done in Paris and London)

If you enjoy a fast paced work environment with opportunities for growth,
development and success, then please send your resume and cover letter in
English to be considered for this position.

BISAM recruits talented individuals around the world and offers a wide variety
of benefits including:

  * Very competitive salary
  * Annual bonus opportunity
  * Internal and external training opportunities
  * Career development opportunities across our various teams and offices in Europe and North America (Paris, London, NY, Boston, LA).

title: Software Engineer
category:
|

  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер
description:
|

Transmetrics is looking for a **Software Engineer**.

**WHO WE ARE:**

Transmetrics is one of the most promising Bulgarian startups, which brings Big
Data and predictive analytics to cargo transport industry in order to improve
capacity utilization.

At Transmetrics we are dedicated to revolutionizing the cargo transport
industry by making it more efficient and environmentally friendly. The 2
trillion EUR global cargo transport industry spends over half of its resources
to transport air. We offer a Big Data predictive analytics solution that
allows cargo transport companies to accurately predict future shipping
volumes, helping them to eliminate empty space in advance and optimize their
networks accordingly. This enables transport companies to improve their
capacity utilization, achieve significant savings and reduce their
environmental impact.

Transmetrics has successfully completed 3 pilot projects with logistics
companies, including the #1 transport company in the world. In 2015,
Transmetrics signed the contract with its first official customer - a DPD-
network partner and since then the team has been working with several world-
known clients.

Transmetrics has grown to 18 highly skilled employees working across Europe.
Our Board of Directors and Advisory Board consists of the current and former
professionals from logistics companies, including DHL, TNT Aviation,
a.hartrodt, Hellmann Worldwide Logistics, who are helping us every step of the
way. Up until now, Transmetrics has raised over EUR 1 million from LAUNCHub
and several business angels.

For our solution, Transmetrics has been internationally recognized with
various awards, including Forbes Business Awards, Startup of the Year by BAIT,
Berlin Startup Activation by EIT ICT Labs (winner), Pioneers Festival (Top-8
out of 850 startups).

**OUR EXPECTATIONS FOR CANDIDATES:**

  * Willingness to work in a startup
  * 2+ years of experience in software development
  * Knowledge of web technologies, Java, PHP, Python, SQL
  * Knowledge of HTML5, CSS, Javascript
  * Experience with AJAX, jQuery and asynchronous programming patterns

  * Good command of written and spoken English
  * Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field and/or demonstrated capability through previous experience

__**JOB DESCRIPTION:**  
  
__

You will join our engineering team in the Sofia office and will work directly
with the CTO. Some of your job responsibilities will be:

  * Collaborating with the rest of the team on product architecture
  * Designing and developing Transmetrics web application part
  * Developing various web and downloadable reports
  * Contributing to product backend modules

**WHAT WE OFFER:**

  * Working in a dynamic and fast-moving startup environment
  * Competitive salary
  * Stock options for the highest performing employees
  * An interesting and meaningful problem to solve. You will work on our product and your work will make a fundamental difference on the performance of the whole company
  * Working in the innovative fields of Big Data and predictive analytics
  * Great international team working across Europe
  * Convenient office location in Sofia (Lozenets district, metro station nearby)
  * 25 days of paid annual vacation
  * Flexible working time
  * Option to work from home periodically

  

_To apply, please send us your CV in English._

_Please note that only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an
interview (usually within 1 week)._

_Your application will be treated with confidentiality._

Knowledge / Skill and Expertise

Experience with Microsoft Office ( Word, Outlook) at advanced user level

title: Senior Front-end (HTML) разработчик
category:
|

  * ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер
description:
|

В продължение на повече от 12 години eDesign е символ на качество в
реализацията на сложни и креативни интернет проекти, портали, уеб страници,
маркетингови кампании, Facebook апликации, мобилен уеб, SEO и др.  
Ние сме най-награждаванта и бързо развиваща се уеб агенция в България, като
сме избирани пет пъти за "Уеб агенция на годината" и сме единствената
българска уеб компания печелила награди в AWWWARDS, FWA и Webby Awards.  
Проектите при нас са интересни, предизвикателни и никога НЕ тръпят компромис
по отношение на качеството.  
  
**В момента компанията търси да назначи:**  
Senior Front-end (HTML) разработчик

**Свободни позиции:**  
2  
  
**Изисквания:**

  * Много добри познания по HTML5 и CSS3;
  * Добри познания по Java Script и jQuery
  * Опит с CSS preprocessors ( LESS, SaSS )
  * Опит в работа с асинхронни методи AJAX;
  * Опит в работата с графични редактори
  * Работа с GSAP ( TweenMax.js );
  * MVC frameworks - Backbone.js;
  * API’s ( Google Maps, Facebook );
  * Task Runners ( GruntJS )
  * Опит с Version control (GIT)
  * Добро владеене на Английски (писмено и говоримо)
  * Самоинициативност
  * Умение за работа в екип
  * Опит поне 3 години

  
**Предлагаме:**

  * Възможност за работа във високо квалифициран и енергичен екип.
  * Реализация в сферата на уеб разработките
  * Гарантираме работа по комплексни и креативни проекти
  * Обезпечаване на разходите за курсове свързане с повишаване на квалификацията
  * Допълнително здравно обслужване
  * Възможност за развитие
  * Бонуси
  * Перфектна среда за работа

  
**Какво се очаква от вас:**

  * Да сте винаги в крак с най-новите технологии
  * Да имате желание за развитие
  * Да сте добър, в това което правите, но да не спирате да се развивате
  * Да сте отговорен по отношение на срокове

  
  
**Необходими документи:**  
\- CV  
\- Portfolio  
  
* Кандидатури неотговарящи на изискванията няма да бъдат разглеждани  
** Избрани кандидати ще бъдат поканени на интервю
